hero.title: The famous windmill problem from the 2011 International Mathematical Olympiad
hero.why:
Let's just take a moment to appreciate how much effort was put into creating such a well animated video. No matter if you like Maths or not, this video is visually and narratively outstanding.
Furthermore, what made me select this video as the highlight of the week is the social takeaways: in Maths (as well as in other disciplines) it is extremely hard to accurately evaluate the level of difficulty of a ‚Äúsimple‚Äù problem.
